column4: Does anyone know any easy way of having an ubuntu system automatically send an email (Cronjob can automate it i know, but need someway to actually send the mails. Commandline)
install mail-utils and a simple mta like ssmtp/msmtp/nullmailer. then send your mails using "mail" via cli
set hosts default route to the firewall-vm-IP
should be, just make sure networking for the VM is set to "bridged" not NAT
